issue_title: CTC Decoding for JAX and Tensorflow
summary: Keras 3 is a multi-backend deep learning framework that supports JAX, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. It allows for accelerated model development, state-of-the-art performance, and datacenter-scale training. The repository provides installation instructions for pip and local installation, as well as instructions for configuring your backend. Keras 3 is designed to work as a drop-in replacement for tf.keras and offers backwards compatibility. It allows users to run high-level Keras workflows on top of any framework, write custom components, and make ML code future-proof.
